Paragraph: The widely used rylene diimides include perylene diimides ( PDIs , 1 ) and naphthalene diimides ( NDIs , 2 ) ( Figure 1 ).

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Naphthalene diimides (NDIs) |

The entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "The" (it is a general term that does not refer to a specific material name)
* "widely used" (it is a general term that does not refer to a specific material name)
* "step" (it is a general term that does not refer to a specific material name)
